reviews.review_msg:
I have taken many classes with him over my degree.
His lectures are where I have learned practical information that is applicable to a career, compared to some courses that seem like u are being set up to stay in academia.
Assignments are fairly graded and helped me learn the course content. Exams always reflect what we learned in class.

Bob is not only really nice to look at, he is a really great instuctor. He is clear and concise in what he is trying to get across to the class.  When I could take my eyes off him I found that what he had to say was very informed and highly interesting. I wish I could take a major in Bobology.
